findings.title: Semantic Imprecision in Tokenomic Amount
findings.description: Potential semantic imprecision in tokenomic amount due to decimal division result without proper method, leading to incorrect minting event interpretation.

findings.title: A02.Owner cannot set max tx amount
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to set a maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Unlimited fees can be set by owner
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to set tax fee up to 100% through functions setDividendFee, setFundFee, setOtherFee, and setNftFee, which can cause issues.
